Plot: Two Texas cowboys head to Mexico in search of work, but soon find themselves in trouble with the law after one of them falls in love with a wealthy rancher's daughter.
Title: All the Pretty Horses
Actors: Matt Damon, Henry Thomas, Penélope Cruz, Angelina Torres
tomatoConsensus: This adaptation of Cormac McCarthy's novel comes off as rather flat and uninvolving. Scenes feel rushed and done in shorthand, and the romance between Damon and Cruz has no sparks.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 13 nominations.
